Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: String
Description: String composed of eleven twisted linen threads of a maroon colour. Each thread twists to the left and the return of the eleven threads is on the right. The twist is intact and folded in half, in the middle of its total length, somewhere around 14 cm. Both extremities are tapered.
